constitutionTest.title: TCM Constitution Test
constitutionTest.subtitle: Scientific assessment of your constitution type for personalized health recommendations

quick.title: Quick Test
quick.description: Complete professional constitution assessment in 5-10 minutes

professional.title: Professional & Authoritative
professional.description: Scientific assessment system based on TCM theory

practical.title: Practical Guidance
practical.description: Acupoint massage, dietary therapy, lifestyle recommendations

instructions.title: Test Instructions
instructions.item1: Please select the answer that best matches your true feelings
instructions.item2: Only one answer can be selected for each question
instructions.item3: The test takes approximately 5-10 minutes to complete
instructions.item4: Results are for reference only and do not replace professional medical advice

descriptions.0-2: Mild discomfort, does not affect daily life
descriptions.5-7: Moderate pain, affects work and study
descriptions.8-10: Severe pain, requires rest or medication

lifestyle.title: Lifestyle Recommendations
lifestyle.description: Based on your constitution type, the following lifestyle adjustments can help improve your health
lifestyle.reminderText: The above recommendations are for reference only. Please seek medical attention if you have serious symptoms

emergencyKit.title: Personalized Emergency Kit Recommendations
emergencyKit.description: Based on your constitution and menstrual pain condition, the following emergency supplies are recommended
emergencyKit.packingAdvice: It is recommended to choose portable packaging for easy carrying

communication.title: Communication Templates
communication.description: Help you better communicate menstrual discomfort with family, friends or colleagues
communication.usageAdvice: Adjust content according to actual situation and choose appropriate tone and expression

messages.testFailedDesc: Please check your network connection and try again
